known_issues: User reports the same issue persists after deploying Version 7 (likely the preview/production link not opening or loading correctly).

existing_features.title: Resolve the production/live publish issue so the live URL loads the Valentine app instead of the Caffeine placeholder screen (“Publish or restore your Caffeine app to make it appear here.”).

Align the app’s canonical/OG URL configuration and any runtime URL logging with the actual published domain shown in the screenshot (https://npt-for-sunidhi.caffeine.xyz) so metadata and production checks do not point to a different site URL.

Add an in-app, user-visible “App loaded” status indicator (non-intrusive) so the user can distinguish between a failed publish/placeholder page and a successfully mounted app without opening DevTools.

projectName: Fix live URL showing Caffeine placeholder and align canonical URL with the published domain
